articles.title: If You Can't Get to a COVID-19 Vaccine Site, Here's What to Do - Healthline
articles.description: As appointments for COVID-19 vaccines become easier to secure, there’s a population of Americans who have had a much harder time accessing the vaccine: homebound individuals. We talked to experts about how people unable to leave their home can get the vaccine.
articles.content:
• As appointments for vaccine sites become easier to secure, theres a population of Americans who have had a much harder time accessing the vaccine: homebound individuals.

articles.author: Reuters Inc.
articles.title: One out of three Americans fully vaccinated for COVID-19, CDC says | Saltwire - SaltWire Network
articles.description:
(Reuters) -     The United States has fully vaccinated 110,874,920 people for COVID-19 as of Friday morning, accounting for 33.4% of the population, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Friday.
